user.title: Set up UniFi Energy Helper
user.description:
This integration will automatically create energy sensors and reset buttons for each UniFi PoE port and PDU outlet.

• One energy sensor per PoE port or PDU outlet
• One reset button per energy sensor
• Real-time energy tracking
• Automatic discovery of new ports/outlets

Click Submit to continue.

abort.single_instance_allowed: Only a single instance is allowed.
abort.no_unifi_poe_devices:
No UniFi PoE or PDU power devices found. Please ensure:
• UniFi Network integration is configured
• You have PoE-capable switches or PDUs
• Power monitoring is enabled
• Power entities are enabled (not disabled)
